Business Profiles on Instagram are linked to Facebook Pages. See %1$s.
"Business Profiles on Instagram are connected to a Facebook Page. We'll copy over info about your business and let you edit it."
Easily create a Page for your business. Business Profiles on Instagram are linked to a Facebook Page.
"Already have a Page? You may not be an admin. Contact your Page's admin to get permissions"
"Don't see your Page here? You may not be an admin. Contact your Page's admin to get permissions."
"Don't see your Page here? You need to login your facebook account and grant permission."
"Edit or remove any information that you don't want displayed on Instagram. You can always edit this at any time in Settings."
People will be able to email, call, and get directions to your business from new buttons and links on your profile.
People will be able to email or call your business directly from a button on your profile.
Please enter at least one way for people contact you.
Please add a valid address so people can navigate to your location in maps.
Your business info is now on your profile. Use the new feature to grow your business on Instagram.
Something went wrong when switching back to personal profile, please try again later.
Please login to Facebook to import page information and convert to business.
Something went wrong when switching to business profile, please try again later.
Something went wrong when editing business profile, please try again later.
How Would You Like To Be Reached?
People will be able to call or text you at this number. Standard messaging rates apply.
To Switch to a business account, your account must be public.
"Business accounts can't be unlinked from Facebook. If you want to unlink your account, first switch back to a personal account."
"If your switch back to a personal account, all active promotions will stop and you'll lose access to insights. You can switch to a Business Account again at any time."
"If your switch back to a personal account, you'll lose access to insights data. You can switch to a Business Account again at any time."
Please log in with Facebook to take this action
Please login to Facebook to continue.
The total number of times your post has been seen.

The amount of budget spent so far divided by the number of clicks.

By tapping the button above and accessing insights, you agree to our %1$s.

If you close the camera now, your video will be discarded.
Before recording video, check your SD card and disconnect your phone from your computer.
Video too long. Please try importing a shorter clip

Videos must be 3 seconds or more

Videos can be up to %1$s seconds

"Sorry, we weren't able to open the map."
"Sorry, we weren't able to make the call."

Network request failed. Please try again later.
"Deleting removes the conversation from your inbox, but no one else's inbox."
Unsending will remove the message for everyone. People may have seen it already.
"Declining means this message will be removed and %1$s won't be able to send you messages anymore."
"Blocking means they won't be able to see your posts or search for you on Instagram."
None of these people will be able to send you messages in the future.
All of these people will be able to send you messages in the future.
Group names must be 20 characters or less.
"Do you want to let %1$s send you messages from now on? They'll only know you've seen their request if you choose Allow."
You may send a message to at most 15 people.
Only their followers will be able to see this photo.
Only their followers will be able to see this video.
Send to friends with a direct message.
"You won't get messages from this group unless someone adds you back to the conversation."
Double tap to like this message
Tap the + icon to send a photo, video or message.
"These messages are from people you don't follow. They'll only know you've seen their request if you choose Allow."
Hidden Photo Thumbnail at Row %1$d, Column %2$d
Hidden Video Thumbnail at Row %1$d, Column %2$d
"This post has been hidden. We'll show fewer posts like this from now on."
"Recent posts from %1$s are currently hidden because the community has reported some content that may not meet Instagram's community guidelines."
Why are you reporting this comment?
Thanks, we will review this comment.
"Please select the photos you'd like to add to your Photo Map or %1$s."
Anyone who visits your Photo Map will be able to see your photo locations.
Remove photos from your map at any time.
"Your Photo Map is currently empty because you haven't geotagged any photos."
Choose \"Add to your Photo Map\" when sharing photos to browse them here.
"You're about to add 1 photo to your map."
"You're about to add %1$s photos to your map."
"We'll permanently remove the location data from the 1 photo you deselected."
"We'll permanently remove the location data from the %1$s photos you deselected."
None of your geotagged photos will be added to your photo map. Their location data will be removed from Instagram permanently.
Please confirm that you want to remove 1 photo from your map. Its location data will be removed from Instagram permanently.
Please confirm that you want to remove %1$s photos from your map. Their location data will be removed from Instagram permanently.
This map is operated by third-party providers. You will be redirected to them to provide feedback.
"When someone comments on or likes one of your photos or videos, you'll see it here."
"When someone you follow comments on or likes a post, you'll see it here."
"This lets you choose whether to share where you took photos and videos, find locations near you, and more. You can always change this later in your phone's settings."
Follow to see their photos and videos.
Follow accounts to see photos and videos here in your feed.
Access to this account has been restricted in your country for legal reasons.
There was a problem starting Instagram. Please uninstall and re-install Instagram and then try again.
You must login before you can share on Instagram

Please check your %1$s username and password

"This video's sharable link has been copied to the clipboard."

You have reached your daily SMS limit, please try again tomorrow.
"Turn privacy ON to approve follow requests. Your existing followers won't be affected."
"Sorry, we weren't able to load that link."
"Turning this on means we'll send you a security code when we need to confirm that it's you logging in."
To turn this on, you need to add a phone number to your account.
"Turning off two-factor authentication means you won't need to enter a security code when you log in."
"Backup codes are useful if you lose access to your phone number and can't receive a security code by text."
"You can get new codes if you're worried this set has been stolen, or if you've used a lot of them."
Backup codes copied to clipboard, please save them someplace safe.
A screenshot of your backup codes has been added to your gallery.
"Screenshot couldn't be saved. Please try again."
You need to grant permission to save this as a screenshot.
"Your backup codes can get you back into your account if you aren't able to receive a security code by text. Make sure you keep them in a safe place."
Enter the 6-digit code we sent to your number ending in %1$s.
"Didn't get a security code? We can resend it."
If your backup codes are saved somewhere safe, use one to log in. Otherwise, please submit a support request.
We can only send you a new code every %1$s seconds.
"Enter the 6-digit confirmation code we sent to %1$s. If you didn't get it, we can resend the code."
"Didn't enter the right phone number? Change it."
"Turning on two-factor authentication means we'll text you a security code to enter every time you log in"
"If you're unable to receive your security code, you can submit a support request and we'll be in touch."
"If you're unable to login, you can submit a support request and we'll be in touch."
Add any details that will help us resolve this more quickly.
"We respond to requests in the order they were received. We'll help you out as soon as we can."
You can use them to get back into your account if you cant receive a security code by text.

"A SMS has been sent to your account's phone number. Please check your message to continue. If you are still having problems, please visit the %1$s."
